text: I'm not sure about "smart redirects" but you could do something where you just do smart content on the TY Page that only shows the CTA to download the PDF if it's a known contact (or in a list of form submissions). The downside to this though is HubSpot might not be able to register that submission in time so even if they submit the form and see the TY page, it will load the anonymous content
or just send the link to teh pdf in an email and just put some secondary content offer on the TY page. But you can't stop people from then sharing the pdf itself if they want
Thanks for the feedback <@UDFSF3N1F> . Interesting idea with the smart content but i also think that the contact wonâ€™t be saved before the content loads
